# Codiumate Chat Help Guide

Welcome to Codiumate Pre-PR Chat

## How to Use Commands

Commands are special instructions you can send in the chat to perform certain actions or to get specific responses from Codiumate. To enter a command, simply type a forward slash `/` followed by the command name.

### Available Commands

Here are the commands you can use:

#### `/describe`

- **Label**: Describe
- **Description**: Generating PR description - title, type, summary, code walkthrough and labels.

Example:

```
/describe
or
/describe make it funny
```

This will generate a funny PR description

---

And that's it! These are the commands currently available. We hope you find this guide useful. Happy coding!

---
